content:
Hi All,
I have several individual IG's . I want to Create one main ig that consists of all individual IG's. When i Publish the main IG then automatically publish the child IG's. Please help me to figure out this.
Thank You.
@Grahame Grieve I have a huge number of profiles,extensions,so i want create like,http://www.fhir.org/guides/registry.Please help me to figure out this.

you can create dependencies between them. so for example an ig for resourceA and then a parent that uses resource A. Im not sure why they have to b
e published at the same time.
